events.text:
So I come to this place often.
and I ALWAYS order some nice mice milkshake. And I always ask for a paper straw right?
nothing weird right?
HOWEVER.
every... single.... time. The bartender ask me.
"Why do you need a paper straw"
and I'm always like.
"It's none of your business"
BUT HE STILL ASKS ME WHY 
and I have to carry this f***** conversation for 5 WHOLE A** MINUTES EVERYTIME!!!!
AND ITS BEEN GOING ON LIKE THIS FOR 3 MONTHS.
everytime he asks that... I...
i just want to teach his a** that a paper straws is superior..
"i don't give a damn on what you have to say. just give me the f****** straw, ok?"
like is it soooo... hard to not ask me this and waste my time?
anyways. sorry for the tangent, I just wanted to vent my frustrations.
